name: Pixel Puzzle: Tile Tap
description:
Play through Millions of brilliantly colored puzzles across four time-limited game modes.

  • Simple to learn, difficult to master
  • Left-Hand / Right Hand friendly; Swap the controls to the side of your dominant hand
  • Your score from the Blitz, Search and Scramble game modes is added up as your time in the Highscore mode! Plus, the more you play each mode, the more time you will bank for playing Highscore Mode!

Try it Free on Mobile!
